title: Game wont open after i try and load it
body: So i just got a new pc and installed leauge when i click the icon to open and log in it does not show up any ideas why ?

replies.body: Grats on your new rig!  Your security settings might be blocking the patcher from launching, so nothing comes up.  The steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide should help fix that up!
